business.headline: Bengaluru man says Rs 1.5 lakh/month not enough: 'Everything is super inflated'In a recent social media post, a Bengaluru resident mentioned that despite earning a good income, he and his fiancée still live in PG accommodation, unable to afford a decent rental space in the city's expensive housing market.

Sensex settles 1,100 points higher, Nifty above 22,800; Zomato surges 7%Stock market closing today: The S&P BSE Sensex settled 1131.31 points higher at 75,301.26, while the NSE Nifty50 closed over 325.55 points higher to 22,834.30.

Zomato stock price zooms 6% today despite reports of insolvency pleaZomato stock price: Despite the insolvency plea, Zomato shares have not been impacted. They were trading 6.03% higher at Rs 216.15 on the Bombay Stock Exchange (BSE). It had earlier reached an intraday high of Rs 216.50.

Online PF transfer claim rejected? How to apply againEPF claims can be turned down for multiple reasons. Hence, to avoid rejections, employees must carefully review and verify the details before submitting the claim form.

NPCI planning to stop 'collect calls'. Here's whyA collect call, or 'pull' transaction, allows merchants to initiate payment requests from customers. Still, fraudsters tend to exploit this mechanism for the purpose of deceiving others into paying for non-existent goods and services.

Explained: How India can shield itself from Donald Trump's tariff stormCan India escape the fallout of Trump's trade war, or will rising tariffs leave its economy exposed? Here is all you need to know.

Planning to buy land in Mumbai? See what $1 million gets youIn 2014, Rs 8 crore could get you 102 sq m of property in Mumbai, but in 2024, it bought only 99 sq m, according to Knight Frank's 'The Wealth Report'.

LIC hopes to decide on stake in health insurance company by March: ReportIf it enters the health space through a stake purchase, LIC will compete with the likes of Star Health Insurance, Aditya Birla Health Insurance, Niva Bupa Health Insurance and Care Health Insurance.

How EPF balance ensures financial security? 5 benefits to knowA sufficient EPF balance is a safety net in tough times. Though you cannot withdraw all the funds at any given point, you can partially withdraw them for certain needs such as a medical emergency, repayment of a home loan, higher studies, or to meet marriage expenses.

Explained: Why Ola Electric shares gained 14% today after hitting record lowOla Electric share price: The rise comes as investors seem to be buying the dip after yesterday's sharp fall. Trading volumes are higher today, supporting the stock's rebound.

LG Electronics India receives Sebi nod for IPO. Check key detailsThe IPO consists solely of an offer for sale (OFS) of up to 10.18 crore equity shares by parent company LG Electronics Inc. The face value of each share is Rs 10.
NMDC shares rise 2% after interim dividend announcement. Check detailsNMDC share price: At 11:15 am, NMDC share price was up 2% to Rs 66.26 on the Bombay Stock Exchange (BSE).

entertainment.headline: Kanneda star Parmish Verma on being shot by gangster: Changed life's meaning for meActor-singer Parmish Verma spoke to India Today about the time he got shot by a gangster. Verma mentioned how such incidents make you step back and look at your life in a new light.

Shekhar Kapur slams OTT for Bandit Queen's edits: No one asked meFilmmaker Shekhar Kapur recently criticised his film, Bandit Queen's OTT edits. Shekhar wrote about how Indian filmmakers are no less than Western directors.

Jeet Adani on joining Shark Tank India: Don't want to change just 1–2 livesJeet Adani will join Shark Tank India as a mentor for the Devang Special week, focusing on businesses by differently-abled entrepreneurs. He will be joined by the visually impaired entrepreneur Srikanth Bolla.

Pankaj Tripathi says he's 'proud' as daughter Aashi makes debut in music videoPankaj Tripathi's daughter Aashi debuts in the music video Rang Daaro. The music video left her parents emotional. Pankaj called it a proud moment as Aashi began her acting journey.

Rapper Hanumankind meets 'GOAT' Virat Kohli at RCB unbox event. See picRapper Hanumankind recently met Virat Kohli at the RCB unbox event at the Chinnaswamy Stadium in Bengaluru. The rapper shared a picture from the special moment on social media.

Adolescence: Why everyone's talking about this mini-series on NetflixNetflix's Adolescence is earning rave reviews for its gripping one-shot storytelling and stellar performances. Critics and filmmakers like Hansal Mehta call it "next-level storytelling."

iHeartRadio Music Awards 2025: Taylor Swift dominates, Lady Gaga earns honourThe 2025 iHeartRadio Music Awards celebrated top artistes, with Taylor Swift dominating the voted categories. Lady Gaga received a special honour, adding to the night's excitement.

Hania Aamir, Farhan Saeed's Mere Humsafar back on TV: When, where to watchThe popular Pakistani romance drama Mere Humsafar, starring Hania Aamir and Farhan Saeed, is making a comeback. Find out when and where you can watch this beloved series.

Alka Yagnik reacts to Osama bin Laden being her fan: Is it my fault?Alka Yagnik's old interview reacting to Osama bin Laden being her fan has resurfaced. She also spoke about industry politics, revealing how she lost songs to senior singers. Her remarks are now viral.

Former Punjab Chief Minister attends Sidhu Moosewala's brother's 1st birthday bashFormer Punjab Chief Minister Charanjit Singh Channi visited Sidhu Moosewala's home to celebrate the first birthday of the late singer's brother, Shubhdeep. The event, held at Musa village, saw Channi participating in the cake-cutting ceremony.

Malaika Arora scolds contestant for inappropriate danceActor Malaika Arora recently scolded a 16-year-old contestant for his inappropriate dance moves. Malaika asked for the contestant's mother's number.

Hina Khan emotional as boyfriend Rocky calls her a 'brave soul' amid cancer battleActor Hina Khan's boyfriend Rocky Jaiswal recently appeared on Celebrity MasterChef. Rocky spoke about Hina;s cancer battle and called her a 'braveheart.'

Salman Khan's nephew Ayaan on stage name Agni and fighting the nepotism tagBollywood superstar Salman Khan's nephew, Ayaan Agnihotri, recently made his music debut. In an exclusive conversation with India Today Digital, the actor opened up about his stage name and battling the nepotism tag.

Exclusive: Tayme on The White Lotus S3, Lisa of Blackpink, Asian representationTayme Thapthimthong's journey from a real-life security guard to a celebrated actor in The White Lotus Season 3 is truly remarkable. Paired with Blackpink's Lisa, Tayme, in an exclusive chat with India Today speaks about his journey, Asian representation and more.

Kim Kardashian vs Kanye West: Rapper fights with ex-wife over daughter's nameKanye West released a song featuring daughter North, despite Kim Kardashian's objections. She took legal action, but Kanye leaked their private chat and refused to back down, escalating their feud.
After CID, Crime Patrol begins to stream on Netflix, fans reactCrime Patrol, the iconic true-crime series on Sony TV, is now available to stream on Netflix. Fans reacted to the announcement.

Kim Soo-hyun and Kim Sae-ron controversy: Exposing Korean industry's double standardsThe controversy involving South Korean actors Kim Soo-hyun and the late Kim Sae-ron has opened a Pandora's box of issues within the entertainment industry, from age-gap relationships to the treatment of disgraced celebrities. As the public grapples with these revelations, the debate continues to rage on about ethics, consent, and gender double standards.

Kim Soo-hyun's agency acts against Indian blogger for unauthorised contentIn a dramatic turn of events, actor Kim Soo-hyun's agency has initiated legal proceedings against an Indian influencer. The influencer shared emails from the agency, revealing that he was threatened for posting 'unauthorised' content.

Hina Khan performs Umrah amid cancer battle, says she's 'overwhelmed, speechless'Actor Hina Khan performed Umrah amid her cancer battle. She shared emotional moments from Mecca on Instagram. Accompanied by her brother, the actor expressed gratitude and prayed for strength while documenting her journey.

general news.headline: PM's message to 'India's daughter' Sunita Williams: Miles away, yet close to heartsSunita Williams expressed her gratitude for the Prime Minister's thoughtful gesture and the support from India during her time in space.

Hamas's head of government in Gaza, top officials killed in Israeli strikesThe latest escalation shattered a two-month ceasefire, with Israeli forces ramping up military operations against Hamas and Netanyahu saying that they will use force to free remaining hostages.

How Aurangzeb has been a controversial figure in India's political sphereAurangzeb has been a deeply polarising figure in Maharashtra. On Monday, clashes broke out in Nagpur amid a row over the removal of the Mughal emperor's tomb.

Sensex settles 1,100 points higher, Nifty above 22,800; Zomato surges 7%Stock market closing today: The S&P BSE Sensex settled 1131.31 points higher at 75,301.26, while the NSE Nifty50 closed over 325.55 points higher to 22,834.30.

Pakistan army's gym rat problemFacing dozens of attacks in restive areas and protests online and offline, Pakistan's once-powerful military seems to have lost the plot and its grip. The Pakistani army's problems are typical of gym rats. This is why the Pakistani military is stuck in a political quicksand as its morale is low.

Astronauts Sunita Williams, Butch Wilmore say goodbye to spaceAstronauts donned the suit, earlier this morning, to begin their journey as they entered the spacecraft and Crew-10 astronauts bid them goodbye before closing the hatch.

BJP wants to make Maharashtra the next Manipur: Aaditya Thackeray on Nagpur riotsAaditya Thackeray, speaking to reporters, lashed out at Chief Minister Devendra Fadnavis for failing to control the violence in his 'home city' Nagpur.

Scientists in Antartica send SOS, report sexual assault, death threats by colleagueScientists at South Africa's Antarctica base sent an email, alleging assault, sexual assault, and death threats from a colleague.

Watch: MS Dhoni channels inner 'Animal' in hilarious ad with Sandeep Reddy VangaMS Dhoni channelled his inner 'Animal' as the former Indian captain and Sandeep Reddy Vanga collaborated for a hilarious ad. Dhoni will be playing in his 18th season of the IPL this year.

Explained: How India can shield itself from Donald Trump's tariff stormCan India escape the fallout of Trump's trade war, or will rising tariffs leave its economy exposed? Here is all you need to know.

PM says Kumbh success example of 'sabka prayaas', Rahul Gandhi rakes up stampede Live UpdatesPM Modi, speaking in the Lok Sabha, said the entire world witnessed the grandeur of India during the Maha Kumbh. The PM said the religious congregation 'reflects the spirit of rising India'.

Fadnavis calls Nagpur violence 'well-planned attack', Opposition blames governmentThe Opposition attacked the state government over the law and order situation after clashes broke out in Nagpur. Chief Minister Devendra Fadnavis and BJP leaders termed the incident a planned attack.

Adolescence: Why everyone's talking about this mini-series on NetflixNetflix's Adolescence is earning rave reviews for its gripping one-shot storytelling and stellar performances. Critics and filmmakers like Hansal Mehta call it "next-level storytelling."

Israel launches extensive airstrikes on Gaza, Palestine claims 330 killedOver 400 people were killed as Israeli airstrikes hit Gaza, breaking a fragile ceasefire since January. The attacks targeted Gaza City, Deir al-Balah, Khan Younis, and Rafah in the most intense bombardment since the truce began.

Nagpur violence: Devendra Fadnavis says 'Chhaava' ignited anger against AurangzebDevendra Fadnavis blamed Vicky Kaushal-starrer Chhaava for igniting anger in people against Aurangzeb as clashes in Nagpur left 30 injured.

Chandrababu Naidu meets Indian-origin teen who built AI app to detect heart diseaseAndhra Pradesh Chief Minister Chandrababu Naidu met 14-year-old Siddharth Nandyala, an Indian-origin student who developed an AI-powered app that detects heart disease in seconds, praising his innovation and assuring government support.

Nestle India MD reacts to fake job posting by Delhi recruiter, company issues advisoryAs the LinkedIn post went viral, Nestle India Managing Director Suresh Narayanan shared it while debunking the job posting as "completely fake, totally untrue and grossly misleading".

What are the signals from Abhishek Banerjee's 'comeback' meetThe virtual gathering helmed by the TMC leader focused on revamping the party organisation and a head start on checking alleged electoral manipulation by its main rival.

How rumours of burning of religious content led to Nagpur violenceNagpur violence: Several vehicles were torched in large-scale arson and vandalism as two communities clashed in Nagpur. The administration has banned large gatherings.

Sunita Williams' homecoming: A visual guide to her journey back to EarthIndia Today visually depicts their homecoming as her SpaceX Dragon capsule splashes down off Florida on Wednesday morning after a 17-hour journey.

Inside Ilaiyaraaja's 'memorable' meeting with PM Modi about his symphonyMusic maestro Ilaiyaraaja met Prime Minister Narendra Modi on March 19. The composer stated that they spoke about many things, including his symphony debut in London.

Rare human coronavirus found in Kolkata woman: What is it?A Kolkata woman has been infected with the human coronavirus HKU1. It is not a new virus. It has been circulating across the globe for over two decades.

You can't stay here: White House's deportation video with hit song sparks rowThe video, a bid by the White House to troll its critics over its crackdown on illegal immigration, shows border agents loading shackled deportees on a plane.

US journalist shares videos of swatting incident at Alabama home, recounts ordealA US journalist based in Alabama said he was swatted at his home at midnight. He recounted his ordeal and shared videos of the incident on social media.

Prabhas's The Raja Saab delayed? Music composer Thaman shares updatesA new update on Prabhas's The Raja Saab was shared by the film's music composer, Thaman S. He revealed that they have only just started working on the film's songs, amid speculation about a delay.

Ayaan Agnihotri says uncle Salman is 'loving, funny, but tough when needed'Alvira and Atul Agnihotri's son Ayaan Agnihotri shared how his uncle Salman Khan balances love with discipline. He also praised Arbaaz and Sohail Khan for their unwavering support.

Inside Ilaiyaraaja's 'memorable' meeting with PM Modi about his symphonyMusic maestro Ilaiyaraaja met Prime Minister Narendra Modi on March 19. The composer stated that they spoke about many things, including his symphony debut in London.

Justin Theroux weds Nicole Brydon Bloom after two years of datingJustin Theroux and Nicole Brydon Bloom married in Tulum, Mexico, after two years of dating. Theroux proposed in Italy in 2024. The couple has yet to make an official statement about their wedding.

sports.headline: Virat Kohli's take on BCCI family rules gets Kapil Dev's nodVirat Kohli's take on the BCCI's family restrictions rule has got the nod from Kapil Dev, who feels there should be a blend in both respects. Kohli spoke on the restrictions recently and admitted he wasn't a big fan of them.

Shreyas Iyer eyes glory with Punjab Kings, excited for Ponting reunionIPL 2025: Newly-appointed captain Shreyas Iyer said he is confident of leading Punjab Kings to their first-ever title in the league. The Indian batter will reunite with head coach Ricky Ponting in the upcoming season.

Virat Kohli has told me not to say 'Ee Sala Cup Namde': AB de VilliersLegendary South Africa batter AB de Villiers said that Virat Kohli has told him not to say 'Ee Sala Cup Namde' anymore. The famous fan chant of RCB, which has been going around for a number of years, translates to 'This year the cup is ours'.

Sanju Samson links up with Rajasthan Royals squad after recovering from injuryRajasthan Royals (RR) captain Sanju Samson has linked up with his team ahead of Indian Premier League 2025 (IPL 2025) after recovering from a finger injury. Samson injured his finger during the fifth T20I against England in Mumbai.

Watch: MS Dhoni channels inner 'Animal' in hilarious ad with Sandeep Reddy VangaMS Dhoni channelled his inner 'Animal' as the former Indian captain and Sandeep Reddy Vanga collaborated for a hilarious ad. Dhoni will be playing in his 18th season of the IPL this year.

Premier League backs Wesley Fofana after racial abuse following London derbyThe Premier League has backed Wesley Fofana after the Chelsea defender was subjected to racial abuse following the London derby loss to Arsenal. The Premier League said that they will take strict measure against people who abused Fofana online.

Shreyas Iyer feels No.4 is where 'he belongs,' claims he was 'typecast'Shreyas Iyer feels that he has a sense of belonging while batting for India at the No.4 spot in ODIs. Shreyas was one of the stars for India in their recent Champions Trophy 2025 triumph in Dubai.

Shafali Verma scalps hat trick in Women's Under 23 Trophy vs KarnatakaHaryana captain Shafali Verma scalped a hat trick during the pre-quarterfinal game of the Women's Under 23 Trophy against Karnataka in Guwahati.

Magnus Carlsen rules out world championship return: Still better than the kidsWorld No.1 Magnus Carlsen has ruled out a return to the classical world championship, claiming that he is better than the current generation of chess players. Carlsen stated that none of the current players could entice him to make a return to the world championship.

Seifert, bowlers help NZ go 2-0 up vs Pakistan with 5-wicket win in 2nd T20INew Zealand beat Pakistan by five wickets in the second T20I of the five-match series at University Oval, Dunedin. The Kiwis comfortably chased down the target of 136 riding on splendid knocks from Tim Siefert and Finn Allen.

Shaheen trolled as Seifert hits him for 4 sixes in an over: Overrated fraudShaheen Shah Afridi was massively trolled on social media as the Pakistan pacer was destroyed by Tim Seifert during the 2nd T20I. Seifert hit Shaheen for 4 sixes in an over as the pacer went wicketless on Tuesday.

Carlsen stated that none of the current players could entice him to make a return to the world championship.

The Kiwis comfortably chased down the target of 136 riding on splendid knocks from Tim Siefert and Finn Allen.

education.headline: The role of data analytics in modern advertising educationThis transformation also exercises a significant impact on the realm of 'advertising education.'

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Year by year, their fiery grip tightens, threatening ecosystems far and wide, now extending their reach to impact human lives.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.

Exclusive: Arvind Kejriwal claims 'BJP succession war, PM backing Amit Shah'Speaking exclusively to India Today TV, Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal claimed that there is a "succession war" within the BJP. He also claimed that the ruling party is "not fighting the Lok Sabha elections as a team".

4 medical students arrested in Bihar for appearing as proxies for NEET aspirantsFour MBBS students who appeared in place of NEET aspirants in the medical entrance exam were detained in Bihar's Purnea.

NEET-UG question paper not leaked, claims baseless: National Testing AgencyThe reports claiming question paper leak in the medical entrance exam NEET-UG are "completely baseless and without any ground", the National Testing Agency (NTA) has clarified.
The generation with answers: Tech-savvy Indian youth tackling global challengesIndia's tech-savvy youth rewriting the global narrative, one solution at a time.

Left sweeps JNU students' polls, Dhananjay is first Dalit presidentThe Left swept the Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls, winning all four posts and trouncing the RSS-affiliated ABVP. The ABVP was leading at one point, but the Left eventually surged ahead and emerged victorious.
The power of knowledge: Education's influence on real estate market trendsIn a dynamic sector like real estate, investing in continuing education is not simply an option; it is a requirement.
